text: Group H of the 2014 FIFA World Cup had the following teams Belgium, Algeria, Russia and South Korea. ==Standings== *Belgium advanced to play United States (runner-up of Group G) in the round of 16. *Algeria advanced to play Germany (winner of Group G) in the round of 16. ==Games== ===Belgium vs Algeria=== {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 1 Thibaut Courtois RB 2
